critique: This document pertains to the Bituminous Coal Act of 1937 and its implementation. It establishes the effective date of the Bituminous Coal Code. Given the context of the New Deal era, the Act likely involves government intervention in the coal industry to stabilize prices, regulate production, and protect workers.
